Learning takes place when we connect new knowledge or ideas with what we already knew. The more connections, the stronger the learning. Create opportunities for connections across disciplines. 6. Share. Share your time, your ideas and your expertise. Share tasks and resources between team members. Share responsibility with your students. 7. Focus on the arts. Use social media to connect and collaborate with educators anywhere, any time. Get the most out of Twitter. Ask someone to help you get started on building an online network. (I will) 10.
